    1: from pathlib import Path
    2: 
    3: import pytest
    4: 
    5: 
    6: @pytest.fixture
    7: def xml_data_path():
    8:     return Path(__file__).parent.parent / "data" / "xml"
    9: 
   10: 
   11: @pytest.fixture
   12: def xml_books(xml_data_path, datapath):
   13:     return datapath(xml_data_path / "books.xml")
   14: 
   15: 
   16: @pytest.fixture
   17: def xml_doc_ch_utf(xml_data_path, datapath):
   18:     return datapath(xml_data_path / "doc_ch_utf.xml")
   19: 
   20: 
   21: @pytest.fixture
   22: def xml_baby_names(xml_data_path, datapath):
   23:     return datapath(xml_data_path / "baby_names.xml")
   24: 
   25: 
   26: @pytest.fixture
   27: def kml_cta_rail_lines(xml_data_path, datapath):
   28:     return datapath(xml_data_path / "cta_rail_lines.kml")
   29: 
   30:

   32: def xsl_flatten_doc(xml_data_path, datapath):
   33:     return datapath(xml_data_path / "flatten_doc.xsl")
